title: Sales Representative - Spanish Bilingual
job_overview:
Looking for a motivated and bilingual (Spanish-English) Sales Representative to join our sales team. This role combines customer service and appointment setting duties, with the goal of building rapport, providing support, and securing qualified appointments for our sales process. If you’re a confident communicator, results-driven, and fluent in Spanish and English, we’d love to hear from you!

Key Responsibilities:
Handle inbound and outbound calls, emails, or chats from Spanish-speaking customers and prospects
Conduct qualification calls and set appointments with our leads
Build and maintain strong customer relationships through excellent service
Accurately document customer interactions and appointment details
Follow up on leads and ensure timely responses

Qualifications:
Fluent in both Spanish and English (spoken and written)
Previous experience in sales, customer service, or appointment setting (1–2 years preferred)
Strong communication, persuasion, and active listening skills
Stable internet connection and a quiet workspace
